_about: Room Configuration - Controls limits for rooms, clients, and variables

limits._comment: Maximum capacity limits for rooms and variables
limits._maxRooms_info: Maximum number of rooms that can exist simultaneously (global limit)
limits._maxClientsPerRoom_info: Maximum number of clients that can connect to a single room
limits._maxVariablesPerRoom_info: Maximum number of variables that can exist in a single room

janitor._comment: Cleanup settings for removing empty/dormant rooms - Saves memory by removing unused rooms
janitor._interval_info: Milliseconds between cleanup scans (3600000 = 1 hour). Lower = more frequent cleanup
janitor._emptyRoomThreshold_info: Milliseconds a room must be empty before janitor removes it (3600000 = 1 hour)
